author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

Removed the few uses of printf style function calls used in FWCore/Utilities. These were replaced with either iostream or fmt::format calls.
Also changed adler32.c to adler32.cc and switched to using C++ constructs (such as std::unique_ptr).

#### PR validation:

The code compiles and the FWCore/Utilities unit tests pass.
title: Replace printf use in FWCore/Utilities
